availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Peoria County, Illinois, attorney. Delaware County, Ohio, native. Son of William Cratty and Candice Bennett Cratty. Laborer in Delaware County, Ohio, in 1850. Law student in Knox County, Illinois, in 1860. Attorney in Peoria County, Illinois, in 1860. Attorney in partnership with William W. O'Brian in Peoria County from 1863 to 1867.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Delaware County, Delaware Township, pp. 190B-191A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Illinois, Salem County, Knox, p. 627.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Illinois, Peoria County, Peoria Ward 5, p. 410B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Peoria County, IL, June 1863, p. 112.
"Death Takes Thomas Cratty, Veteran Chicago Lawyer," The Chicago Daily Tribune (Chicago, IL), September 20, 1913, p. 2.
The History of Peoria County, Illinois (Chicago: Johnson & Company, 1880), 637.
